nodes.text: The Gannarian Run was a hyperspace route located in the galaxy. The Spice Runners of Kijimi attempted a heist on the Gannarian Run, stealing from a spice crop grown by an ex-Imperial. Following their heist attempt, the Spice Runners got into a battle with antiquated TIE fighters. The hyperspace route shared its name with Gannaria, a world in the Outer Rim Territories.
